sentences.en: [as modifier]a hand-to-mouth existence.
sentences.cn: 勉强维持的生活。

sentences.en: All this, needless to say, had been culled second-hand from radio reports.
sentences.cn: 不用说，所有这些都是从电台报道中采集来的二手材料。

sentences.en: Anna reached out her hand to him and clasped his.
sentences.cn: 安娜向他伸出手，两双手握在一起。

sentences.en: hands off that cake tin!.
sentences.cn: 不许碰那蛋糕筒！。

sentences.en: Having the right equipment at hand will be enormously helpful.
sentences.cn: 手头上有合适的设备将会帮上大忙。

sentences.en: He cupped her chin in the palm of his hand.
sentences.cn: 他用手心托着她的下巴。

sentences.en: He laid his hand gently on the crown of her head.
sentences.cn: 他把手轻轻放在她的头顶上。

sentences.en: He took Dickon by the hand to lead him into the house.
sentences.cn: 他牵着迪康的手把他领进屋。

sentences.en: He was hand-picked for this job by the Admiral.
sentences.cn: 他是由海军上将精心挑选出来担任这项工作的。

sentences.en: Her hand was just visible by the light from the sitting room.
sentences.cn: 借着起居室的灯光，勉强能看见她的手。

sentences.en: I was bothered about the blister on my hand.
sentences.cn: 手上起的水泡让我心烦。

sentences.en: In her hand was a tattered old photograph.
sentences.cn: 她手中拿着的是一张破旧的老照片。

sentences.en: Moretti ran a hand through his disordered red hair.
sentences.cn: 莫雷蒂用手理了理他那一头凌乱的红发。

sentences.en: Sarah lifted her hand and started twirling a strand of hair.
sentences.cn: 萨拉抬起手来开始用手指缠绕一缕头发。

sentences.en: She is expected soon to hand down a ruling.
sentences.cn: 估计她很快会宣布裁决结果。

sentences.en: Stand straight and stretch the left hand to the right foot.
sentences.cn: 站直身体,伸左手够右脚.

sentences.en: Steve gripped the steering wheel tightly with both hands.
sentences.cn: 史蒂夫双手紧握方向盘。

sentences.en: Swindon won hands down… 4–1.
sentences.cn: 斯温顿轻松获胜…4比1。

sentences.en: Sylvia, camera in hand, asked, "Where do we go first?"
sentences.cn: 西尔维娅手里拿着相机问道：“我们先去哪里？”

sentences.en: tests he would undergo at the hands of a senior neurologist.
sentences.cn: 将由一位高级神经病学家对他进行的检查。

sentences.en: the hour hand
sentences.cn: 时针

sentences.en: The little boy stepped forward timidly and shook Leo's hand.
sentences.cn: 小男孩羞怯地走上前去握了握利奥的手。

sentences.en: they were flat broke and living hand to mouth.
sentences.cn: 他们完全破产了，过着仅能糊口的日子。

sentences.en: they were working &B{hand in glove with} our enemies.
sentences.cn: 他们与我们的敌人勾结在一起。

sentences.en: To communicate with her, you have to spell words out on her hand.
sentences.cn: 跟她交流，你必须把字一个个地在她手心里拼写出来。

words.tran_cn: 无手的；笨手笨脚的；赤手空拳的
便利的；手边的，就近的；容易取得的；敏捷的

phrases.tran_cn: 全体（船员）上甲板（遇紧急情况时命令全体船员上甲板待命的呼叫或信号）

phrases.phrase: at (或 by) the hands (或 hand) of
bind (或 tie) someone hand and foot
phrases.tran_cn: 把某人手脚捆在一起，把某人牢牢捆住
使自己变得（或保持）熟练
宣布：做出并宣布一个官方决议，尤其指法庭的一个判决
让渡：放弃或让出（财产）给别人
adv. 在手头；在进行中；在控制中
无法控制；脱手，告终；立即

trans.tran_cn: 手，用…手的，作用，照顾，工人，船员，手工，手中的牌，一手之宽，指针，字迹
trans.tran_en: the part of your body at the end of your arm, including your fingers and thumb, that you use to hold things
the part of your body at the end of your arm, including your fingers and thumb, that you use to hold things
to give something to someone else with your hand
to give something to someone else with your hand
